public.title: Mehretu

edition.note: 24" giclée print signed by Nick Kuder.

public.description:
Confecta is a subtle visual game, played on a 4 x 4 grid of dots, that celebrates the pleasure of color. It explores variations of simple forms and unique color combinations within the tight formal constraints of Contecta's system.

The series was created in 2022 using a hybrid of generative and procedural processes by Nick Kuder, an Associate Professor of art, graphic designer, and visual artist.

The collection consists of 100 unique works. Each piece is named in honor of an artist, designer, or scientist who contributed to the study of color through their work — including some who were directly significant in helping shape Kuder's own development as an artist and designer. This one is a tribute to Julie Mehretu.

The collection consists of 100 unique works. Each piece is named in honor of an artist, designer, or scientist who contributed to the study of color through their work — including some who were directly significant in helping shape Kuder's own development as an artist and designer. This one is a tribute to Julie Mehretu.

public.title: Schematic

edition.note: 24" giclée print signed by Nick Kuder

public.description:
Nick Kuder often switches from rational and systematic to spirited and intuitive, resulting in work that is equal parts Apollonian and Dionysian.

Schematic is a highly formalistic work based on mathematical and consequential systems, utilizing such elements to build an aesthetic framework that generates thought provoking and playful artistic production. 

Offering an investigation into the possibilities of forms using a restrained and elegant language, Schematic is arranged in a predetermined mathematical sequence, yet the rhythmic progression through the forms via experience reveals an innate and intimate artistic gesture.

Schematic was acquired by the Hashes DAO for its permanent collection in November 2021 from the Sotheby’s Contemporary Curated series featured alongside works from Andy Warhol, Kaws, Banksy, and Marina Abramovich.

edition.note: 24" giclée print signed by Nick Kuder

public.description:
Nick Kuder often switches from rational and systematic to spirited and intuitive, resulting in work that is equal parts Apollonian and Dionysian.

Schematic is a highly formalistic work based on mathematical and consequential systems, utilizing such elements to build an aesthetic framework that generates thought provoking and playful artistic production. 

Offering an investigation into the possibilities of forms using a restrained and elegant language, Schematic is arranged in a predetermined mathematical sequence, yet the rhythmic progression through the forms via experience reveals an innate and intimate artistic gesture.

Schematic was acquired by the Hashes DAO for its permanent collection in November 2021 from the Sotheby’s Contemporary Curated series featured alongside works from Andy Warhol, Kaws, Banksy, and Marina Abramovich.

Nick Kuder often switches from rational and systematic to spirited and intuitive, resulting in work that is equal parts Apollonian and Dionysian.

Schematic is a highly formalistic work based on mathematical and consequential systems, utilizing such elements to build an aesthetic framework that generates thought provoking and playful artistic production. 

Offering an investigation into the possibilities of forms using a restrained and elegant language, Schematic is arranged in a predetermined mathematical sequence, yet the rhythmic progression through the forms via experience reveals an innate and intimate artistic gesture.

Schematic was acquired by the Hashes DAO for its permanent collection in November 2021 from the Sotheby’s Contemporary Curated series featured alongside works from Andy Warhol, Kaws, Banksy, and Marina Abramovich.

Offering an investigation into the possibilities of forms using a restrained and elegant language, Schematic is arranged in a predetermined mathematical sequence, yet the rhythmic progression through the forms via experience reveals an innate and intimate artistic gesture.

Schematic was acquired by the Hashes DAO for its permanent collection in November 2021 from the Sotheby’s Contemporary Curated series featured alongside works from Andy Warhol, Kaws, Banksy, and Marina Abramovich.

public.title: Schematic

edition.note: Giclée print signed by Nick Kuder

public.description:
Nick Kuder often switches from rational and systematic to spirited and intuitive, resulting in work that is equal parts Apollonian and Dionysian.

Schematic is a highly formalistic work based on mathematical and consequential systems, utilizing such elements to build an aesthetic framework that generates thought provoking and playful artistic production.

Offering an investigation into the possibilities of forms using a restrained and elegant language, Schematic is arranged in a predetermined mathematical sequence, yet the rhythmic progression through the forms via experience reveals an innate and intimate artistic gesture.

Schematic was acquired by the Hashes DAO for its permanent collection in November 2021 from the Sotheby’s Contemporary Curated series featured alongside works from Andy Warhol, Kaws, Banksy, and Marina Abramovich.
